attributes.action: Only tax contractual/ standard hours, do not tax on over time.
attributes.additional_details:
People are struggling across the UK specially the working people. We are in a losing situation. Local businesses closing as no one can afford anything even with overtime,  small businesses closing due to lack of spending so they are unable to pay there bills and taxes. 
We are working for nothing.
attributes.background: This will help all working class people to earn money that Is well needed, this will also increase people's spending and help all businesses around there local areas. It is a win win for everyone in all communities l.
